reviewTitle: No doubt a great product but you need to plan beforehand as it contains too many wires
reviewDescription: The product is great, superb sound quality, no doubt about it! But I was a bit disappointed by the inconvenience related to installation.First, you need to plan beforehand whether you have the arrangements to conceal all the wires coming out of subwoofer-- fat HDMI cable to your TV, power souce cable, wired to soundbar and the two surround speakers. Otherwise if you're not much worried about a cleaner setup then fine.Second, though the wires connecting the surround speakers are long enough but for some customers it might fall short depending on how you want to wrap it around the corners to conceal them. AND THERE OFFICIAL NO WAY TO EXTEND THE WIRES. though if you want you can cut the wires and extend but then there will be warrenty issues.Third, installation just means they'll fix the soundbar and speakers where you say. connect the wires and maybe explain some features. yes for most of the customers the installation is pointless since all this we can do ourselves. Also, they wont do any extra electric work or help in concealing the wires properly even if you're ready to pay extra charges. Thus be ready to do all the extra work yourself if you wish to make the setup look nicer.Other than this the product is great!!
Product performance is good but the only draw back the connection is not wireless. Other functions are perfect.
